The company announced on the 2nd at 10:50 AM that it has started full-scale provision of a digital inspection service that utilizes measurement data from drones and 3D scanners at construction sites and shares inspection records remotely. According to the article, the new service aims to reduce the burden of site visits and expedite information sharing by creating high-precision 3D data using drones and 3D scanners such as "Matterport" and sharing information via the cloud. By having the company's inspection practical team lead and provide nationwide support, it will support labor-saving and efficiency improvements in inspection operations. *12:54 Taiyo Yuden - Rises for 6 consecutive days; Starts mass production of 100μF capacitance capacitors in 2012 size. Taiyo Yuden <6976> rose for the sixth consecutive day. The company announced on the 2nd that it has commercialized and started mass production of a board-embedded multilayer ceramic capacitor (MLCC) that achieves a capacitance of 100μF (microfarads) in a 2012 size (2.0x1.25 millimeters), a world first. This product is an MLCC for decoupling applications in IC power lines used in information equipment, including AI servers. It is said to expand the product lineup, in addition to the 1005-size board-embedded MLCC commercialized in September. *13:17 NEC - Rebounds for the first time in 6 days; Launches AI agent service to automate procurement negotiations. NEC <6701> rebounded for the first time in six days. The company announced on the 2nd that it will launch the "NEC Procurement Negotiation AI Agent Service" in December, which utilizes its proprietary AI technology "Automated Negotiation AI" to autonomously generate the best transaction conditions in manufacturing procurement operations and negotiate with suppliers. The service aims to automate complex delivery date and quantity adjustment negotiations in manufacturing, thereby reducing the enormous amount of time spent on transaction-related negotiations, and achieving rapid response to demand fluctuations and significant improvements in operational efficiency. *13:19 Mitsubishi Electric - Continues to rise; Launches new products in power semiconductor "HVIGBT Module XB Series". Mitsubishi Electric <6503> continued to rise. The company announced on the 2nd that it will launch two new products in the high-capacity power semiconductor "HVIGBT Module XB Series" for large industrial equipment such as railway vehicles on the 9th: a standard insulation product with a withstand voltage of 4.5kV (insulation withstand voltage 6.0kVrms) and a high insulation product (insulation withstand voltage 10.2kVrms). In addition to adopting proprietary diodes and IGBT elements, the company has achieved improved moisture resistance by adopting a proprietary chip termination structure, which is expected to contribute to further efficiency and reliability improvements for inverters in large industrial equipment such as railway vehicles operating in various environments. *13:19 Alfresa Holdings - Rebounds; To collaborate with CMIC HD on building a comprehensive vaccination support system. Alfresa Holdings <2784> rebounded. The company announced on the 2nd that it has reached a basic agreement on collaboration with CMIC Holdings (Minato-ku, Tokyo), which provides pharmaceutical development support, and its subsidiary CMIC Trust, regarding the construction of a comprehensive vaccination support system. Through this collaboration, the companies plan to conduct joint research and development on enhancing the functions of Alfresa's vaccination appointment service "Vaccine Plat" and CMIC Group's medical institution app "harmo Vaccine Care," leveraging their respective strengths, with the aim of building a platform that comprehensively supports medical institutions, local governments, and residents in vaccination. *13:37 Kuribayashi Steamship - Rebounds for the first time in 3 days; Establishes joint venture for new rudder "Gate Rudder". Kuribayashi Steamship <9171> rebounded for the first time in three days. The company announced on the 1st that it will establish Gate Rudder Design Center, a joint venture to support the basic design work for the new rudder "Gate Rudder," in April 2025, and has now concluded a basic design agreement with a major domestic shipbuilding company. The joint venture is jointly invested by Nisshin Kaiun (Imabari City, Ehime Prefecture), Daiichi Chuo Kisen (Minato-ku, Tokyo), and Kamome Propeller (Yokohama City, Kanagawa Prefecture). Currently, basic design work is underway for the implementation of the Gate Rudder on approximately 60 vessels, and discussions are being held with shipowners and shipyards both domestically and internationally. By combining the strengths of each company, the aim is to accelerate the global adoption of the Gate Rudder through basic design work.

headline: Nikkei 225 rises by about 260 yen, top gaining stocks among constituents are FANUC, NGK Insulators, Sumitomo Electric Industries, etc.
description: Sumitomo Electric Industries was listed among the top percentage gainers on the Nikkei 225, which was trading around 49,560 yen, up by approximately 260 yen from the previous day.
key_takeaways: The Nikkei 225 index showed a significant increase, trading up by about 260 yen to 49,560 yen, and reaching 49,636.79 yen earlier.;Top percentage gainers included Fanuc, NGK Insulators, Sumitomo Electric Industries, Yaskawa Electric, and IHI.;Top percentage losers included Tokyo Electric Power Company Holdings, Mitsukoshi Isetan Holdings, SHIFT, Daiichi Sankyo, and Sumitomo Pharma.;The dollar-yen exchange rate remained largely unchanged at approximately 155.60 yen to the dollar.;The index traded in a narrow range after extending its initial gains.
breaking_recap_reasoning: The article reports on current market conditions and specific stock movements observed at precise times (e.g., 'shortly after 11:00 AM on the 2nd', 'At 10:16 AM'), indicating newly happened events rather than a summary of past information.
source: ウエルスアドバイザー
news_worthy_reasoning: The article is a multi-company market report primarily focused on the overall Nikkei 225 index performance. While it mentions Sumitomo Electric Industries as a top gainer, it provides no company-specific news, events, or reasons for this price movement. It lacks actionable intelligence directly related to the company's fundamentals or future prospects, making it 'too noisy' and generic for trading decisions.
news_worthy_key_factors: Multi-company consolidation: Sumitomo Electric Industries is one of many companies listed., Lack of company-specific news: No underlying reason for SMTOY's gain is provided, only the price movement itself., Focus on market index: The primary focus is the Nikkei 225 index's daily performance., No actionable intelligence: The article only reports a price movement, not a catalyst or fundamental change.
original_headline: 日経平均は２６０円程度高、採用銘柄の値上がり率上位はファナック、ガイシ、住友電工など
main_content: ２日午前１１時すぎの日経平均株価は、前日比２６０円程度高い４万９５６０円近辺で推移する。午前１０時１６分には、同３３３円５１銭高の４万９６３６円７９銭まで上げ幅を広げる場面もみられた。その後は、もみ合い商状となっている。ドル・円相場は１ドル＝１５５円６０銭台と、朝方の水準から小動き。日経平均採用銘柄では、値上がり率の上位に、ファナック < 6954 > 、ガイシ < 5333 > 、住友電工 < 5802 > 、安川電 < 6506 > 、ＩＨＩ < 7013 > などがランクイン。一方、値下がり率上位に、東電力ＨＤ < 9501 > 、三越伊勢丹 < 3099 > 、ＳＨＩＦＴ < 3697 > 、第一三共 < 4568 > 、住友ファーマ < 4506 > が入っている。
main_content_en: The Nikkei 225 stock average was trading around 49,560 yen, up by approximately 260 yen from the previous day, shortly after 11:00 AM on the 2nd. At 10:16 AM, the index was also seen extending its gains to 49,636.79 yen, up by 333.51 yen. Since then, it has been trading in a narrow range. The dollar-yen exchange rate was around 155.60 yen to the dollar, showing little movement from early morning levels. Among the Nikkei 225 constituent stocks, Fanuc <6954>, NGK Insulators <5333>, Sumitomo Electric Industries <5802>, Yaskawa Electric <6506>, and IHI <7013> were among the top percentage gainers. Meanwhile, Tokyo Electric Power Company Holdings <9501>, Mitsukoshi Isetan Holdings <3099>, SHIFT <3697>, Daiichi Sankyo <4568>, and Sumitomo Pharma <4506> were among the top percentage losers.

headline: Today's [All-time High Update] Duskin, Mitsubishi UFJ, and 30 other stocks
description: Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group updated its all-time high stock price today, having priced in a December interest rate hike. This contributed to a general increase in bank stocks, which drove the Nikkei 225 average to rebound.
key_takeaways: The Nikkei 225 average rebounded, rising 17 sen to 49,303 yen.;30 companies updated their all-time high stock prices, indicating strong market momentum for these 'blue-sky stocks'.;Bank stocks, such as Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group, surged due to expectations of a Bank of Japan interest rate hike in December.;Key drivers for individual stock highs included Morgan Stanley MUFG Securities upgrading Duskin's rating, Business Engineering's investment in a Thai company, and Osaka Gas's joint development agreement.;The article highlights 'blue-sky stocks' as having no resistance levels from past trading, suggesting potential for further gains.
breaking_recap_reasoning: The article primarily reports on market movements and specific company stock performance that occurred 'today', including the Nikkei's rebound and 30 companies updating all-time highs, indicating newly happened events.
news_worthy_reasoning: The article is a multi-company market summary, with Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group being one of 30 companies mentioned for hitting an all-time high. The reason provided for MUFG's performance (expectations of a Bank of Japan interest rate hike being 'priced in') is a general market sentiment already reflected in the stock price, not a new, specific, or actionable development from the company itself. The content is diluted and lacks company-specific actionable intelligence.
news_worthy_key_factors: Multi-company consolidation article, not focused on MUFG., MUFG is one of 30 companies listed, with a brief and generic explanation., The reason for MUFG's stock movement is a general market expectation ('priced in') rather than a specific, new company event., Lacks specific, forward-looking actionable intelligence for MUFG.
original_headline: 本日の【上場来高値更新】 ダスキン、三菱ＵＦＪなど30銘柄
main_content: 本日の日経平均株価は、日銀の利上げ観測を背景に銀行株などが上昇し、前日比17銭高の4万9303円と小幅に反発した。相場全体が上昇するなか、上値追いで上場来高値を更新した銘柄は30社だった。上場来高値を更新した銘柄は過去の売買による抵抗帯がなく、いわゆる“株価青天井”銘柄として注目される。上場来高値を更新した主な銘柄は、モルガン・スタンレーMUFG証券が投資判断を格上げしたダスキン<4665>[東証Ｐ]、製薬業界向けＭＥＳを提供するタイの企業に出資すると発表したビジネスエンジニアリング<4828>[東証Ｐ]、12月の利上げ織り込んだ三菱ＵＦＪフィナンシャル・グループ<8306>[東証Ｐ]、伊藤忠・邦ガスと合成メタン製造に向け共同開発契約締結した大阪ガス<9532>[東証Ｐ]など。そのほか、因幡電機産業<9934>[東証Ｐ]は7日連続で高値を更新した。※23年1月時点で株式を新規公開し、東証プライム、スタンダード、グロース市場に上場する銘柄を対象とした。■本日、上場来高値を更新した銘柄一覧<2768>双日 東Ｐ 卸売業<2914>ＪＴ 東Ｐ 食料品<3197>すかいらーく 東Ｐ 小売業<3449>テクノフレ 東Ｓ 金属製品<4368>扶桑化学 東Ｐ 化学<4665>ダスキン 東Ｐ サービス業<4828>ビーエンジ 東Ｐ 情報・通信業<4966>上村工 東Ｓ 化学<5802>住友電 東Ｐ 非鉄金属<5831>しずおかＦＧ 東Ｐ 銀行業<6016>ジャパンエン 東Ｓ 輸送用機器<6144>西部電機 東Ｓ 機械<6379>レイズネク 東Ｐ 建設業<6777>ｓａｎｔｅｃ 東Ｓ 電気機器<7167>めぶきＦＧ 東Ｐ 銀行業<7173>東京きらぼし 東Ｐ 銀行業<7181>かんぽ生命 東Ｐ 保険業<7182>ゆうちょ銀 東Ｐ 銀行業<7327>第四北越ＦＧ 東Ｐ 銀行業<7456>松田産業 東Ｐ 卸売業<7966>リンテック 東Ｐ その他製品<8060>キヤノンＭＪ 東Ｐ 卸売業<8306>三菱ＵＦＪ 東Ｐ 銀行業<8591>オリックス 東Ｐ その他金融業<8630>ＳＯＭＰＯ 東Ｐ 保険業<9367>大東港運 東Ｓ 倉庫運輸関連<9532>大ガス 東Ｐ 電気・ガス業<9719>ＳＣＳＫ 東Ｐ 情報・通信業<9845>パーカー 東Ｓ 化学<9934>因幡電産 東Ｐ 卸売業
main_content_en: Today's Nikkei 225 average slightly rebounded, rising 17 sen from the previous day to 49,303 yen, driven by an increase in bank stocks amid expectations of a Bank of Japan interest rate hike. As the overall market rose, 30 companies updated their all-time high stock prices, continuing their upward trend. Stocks that hit all-time highs are noteworthy as so-called 'blue-sky stocks' (stocks with no upper limit), as they have no resistance levels from past trading. Key stocks that updated their all-time highs include Duskin <4665> [TSE P], for which Morgan Stanley MUFG Securities upgraded its investment rating; Business Engineering <4828> [TSE P], which announced an investment in a Thai company providing MES for the pharmaceutical industry; Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group <8306> [TSE P], which has priced in a December interest rate hike; and Osaka Gas <9532> [TSE P], which concluded a joint development agreement with Itochu and Kunigas for synthetic methane production. Additionally, Inaba Denki Sangyo <9934> [TSE P] updated its high for the seventh consecutive day. *Targeted stocks are those newly listed as of January 2023 on the TSE Prime, Standard, and Growth markets. ■List of stocks that updated all-time highs today<2768> Sojitz [TSE P] Wholesale Trade<2914> JT [TSE P] Foods<3197> Skylark [TSE P] Retail Trade<3449> TechnoFlex [TSE S] Metal Products<4368> Fuso Chemical [TSE P] Chemicals<4665> Duskin [TSE P] Services<4828> Business Engineering [TSE P] Information & Communication<4966> Kamimura Kogyo [TSE S] Chemicals<5802> Sumitomo Electric Industries [TSE P] Nonferrous Metals<5831> Shizuoka Financial Group [TSE P] Banking<6016> Japan Engine Corporation [TSE S] Transportation Equipment<6144> Seibu Electric & Machinery [TSE S] Machinery<6379> Raisecom [TSE P] Construction<6777> Santec [TSE S] Electric Appliances<7167> Mebuki Financial Group [TSE P] Banking<7173> Tokyo Kiraboshi Financial Group [TSE P] Banking<7181> Japan Post Insurance [TSE P] Insurance<7182> Japan Post Bank [TSE P] Banking<7327> Daishi Hokuetsu Financial Group [TSE P] Banking<7456> Matsuda Sangyo [TSE P] Wholesale Trade<7966> Lintec [TSE P] Other Products<8060> Canon Marketing Japan [TSE P] Wholesale Trade<8306> Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group [TSE P] Banking<8591> ORIX [TSE P] Other Financial Business<8630> SOMPO Holdings [TSE P] Insurance<9367> Daito Corporation [TSE S] Warehousing & Transportation<9532> Osaka Gas [TSE P] Electric Power & Gas<9719> SCSK [TSE P] Information & Communication<9845> Parker Corporation [TSE S] Chemicals<9934> Inaba Denki Sangyo [TSE P] Wholesale Trade

headline: Morning Session Comment No.1 FANUC, Ito En, GALA, SEH&I, Toray, FFJ
description: FANUC announced a collaboration with NVIDIA to promote the implementation of physical AI in industrial robots, utilizing "NVIDIA Isaac Sim" to realize digital twins in virtual factories. The company plans to unveil examples of these physical AI applications at the International Robot Exhibition in December.
key_takeaways: FANUC received a buy indication after announcing a collaboration with NVIDIA to implement physical AI in industrial robots.;Ito En showed a sell indication as its first-half operating profit of 13.9 billion yen was below the market consensus of 15.6 billion yen.;GALA's subsidiary, Gala Lab Corp, is partnering with Wemade Connect to develop a new game, "Ragnarok Universe," aiming to establish it as a global e-sports platform.;SE H&I announced a share buyback program of up to 300,000 shares or 100 million yen, representing 1.91% of outstanding shares.;Toray expects a total profit increase effect of 60 billion yen by the fiscal year ending March 2029 through price measures, an increase of 10 billion yen from its previous plan, while Fast Fitness Japan is set for delisting through an MBO at a tender offer price of 2,315 yen per share.
breaking_recap_reasoning: The article primarily reports on FANUC's newly announced collaboration with NVIDIA and their future plans to unveil new applications, which constitutes a newly happened event, despite the initial mention of a 'buy indication'.
source: トレーダーズ・ウェブ
news_worthy_reasoning: The article is a multi-company consolidation report, covering several Japanese companies. While it contains specific and potentially significant news regarding FANUC's collaboration with NVIDIA on AI for industrial robots, the information is diluted by the inclusion of news for multiple other companies. This makes it 'too noisy' and not primarily focused on FANUC, thus reducing its direct actionable intelligence for a trader specifically tracking FANUC.
news_worthy_key_factors: Multi-company consolidation format, Information diluted by other company news, Not primarily dedicated to FANUC CORP, Fits the 'Too Noisy' criterion for insignificance
original_headline: 前場コメント No.1　ファナック、伊藤園、ガーラ、ＳＥＨ＆Ｉ、東レ、ＦＦＪ
main_content: 前場コメント No.1 ファナック、伊藤園、ガーラ、ＳＥＨ＆Ｉ、東レ、ＦＦＪ11:31配信現在値伊藤園3,053-120.00東レ1,004.5+0.50ガーラ228+5ファナック5,413+375ＳＥＨ＆Ｉ416+24★9:00 ファナック－買い気配 エヌビディアと協業 産業用ロボのフィジカルAI実装を推進ファナック<6954>が買い気配。同社は1日、米エヌビディアと協業し、産業用ロボットのフィジカルAI実装を推進すると発表した。オープンソースのロボットシミュレーション用レファレンス フレームワークである「NVIDIA Isaac Sim」により、フォトリアルな仮想工場におけるデジタルツインを実現する。12月開催の国際ロボット展では、オープンプラットフォーム上に実装されたフィジカルAIアプリケーションの実例を初公開するとしている。★9:00 伊藤園－売り気配 上期営業益3.2％減 コンセンサス下回る伊藤園<2593>が売り気配。同社は1日、26.4期上期（5-10月）の連結営業利益は139億円（前年同期比3.2％減）だったと発表した。市場コンセンサスは156億円。主力のリーフ・ドリンク関連事業において、米国コーヒー豆事業の採算性改善があったものの、主原料である緑茶をはじめとする各種コストの上昇を受けて減益となったことなどが響いた。★9:00 ガーラ－買い気配 人気ゲーム「ラグナロク」の新作開発に本格着手ガーラ<4777>が買い気配。同社は1日、子会社のＧａｌａ Ｌａｂ Ｃｏｒｐが韓国のゲーム開発会社であるＷｅｍａｄｅ Ｃｏｎｎｅｃｔと共同で、グラビティ（韓国）が保有するグローバルヒットIP「ラグナロク」を活用した新作プロジェクト開発に関する協業契約を締結したと発表した。これにより、新規ゲームタイトル「ラグナロク ユニバース」の開発に本格的に着手した。Ｇａｌａ Ｌａｂ Ｃｏｒｐは代表作「Flyff Universe」における国際eスポーツ大会「FWC（Flyff World Championship）」で培ったグローバルeスポーツ運営ノウハウを活用し、「ラグナロク ユニバース」を本格的なグローバルeスポーツプラットフォームへ発展させる計画としている。★9:01 ＳＥ Ｈ＆Ｉ－買い気配 30万株・1億円を上限に自社株買い 割合は1.91％ＳＥホールディングス・アンド・インキュベーションズ<9478>が買い気配。同社は1日、30万株・1億円を上限とした自己株取得枠を設定すると発表した。取得期間は2025年12月2日～12月23日。なお、上限株数を取得した場合の自己株式を除いた発行済株式総数に対する割合は1.91％となる。★9:01 東レ－反発 値上げ、600億円増益効果 29.3期まで＝日経東レ<3402>が反発。2日付の日本経済新聞朝刊は、同社の大矢光雄社長が、値上げなどの価格施策で29.3期までに合計600億円の増益効果を見込むと明らかにしたと報じた。記事によれば、1日に開いた説明会で明らかにしたようだ。従来の計画から100億円引き上げたという。製品の販売数量の拡大が想定ほど伸びないなか、価格を上げて収益の改善につなげるとしている。★9:01 ＦＦＪ－買い気配 MBOで上場廃止へ TOB価格は2315円Ｆａｓｔ Ｆｉｔｎｅｓｓ Ｊａｐａｎ<7092>が買い気配。同社は1日に、マネジメント・バイアウト（MBO）の一環として行われる、ＪＧ３５（東京都港区）による同社株の公開買い付けに関して賛同の意見を表明するとともに、株主に対して同公開買い付けへの応募を推奨すると発表した。TOBの買付価格（普通株式）は1株につき2315円で、買付期間は2025年12月2日から2025年1月20日まで。普通株式の買付予定数は990万5452株で、下限は325万4600株。上限は設けない。なお、TOB完了後は一連の手続きを経て、同社株は上場廃止となる見込み。畑尾
main_content_en: Morning Session Comment No. 1: FANUC, Ito En, GALA, SE H&I, Toray, FFJDistributed at 11:31 Current PriceIto En 3,053 -120.00Toray 1,004.5 +0.50GALA 228 +5FANUC 5,413 +375SE H&I 416 +24★9:00 FANUC - Buy indication: Collaborating with NVIDIA to promote physical AI implementation for industrial robotsFANUC <6954> showed a buy indication. The company announced on the 1st that it will collaborate with U.S. NVIDIA to promote the implementation of physical AI in industrial robots. Through "NVIDIA Isaac Sim," an open-source reference framework for robot simulation, they will realize digital twins in photorealistic virtual factories. At the International Robot Exhibition held in December, they plan to unveil for the first time examples of physical AI applications implemented on an open platform.★9:00 Ito En - Sell indication: First-half operating profit down 3.2%, below consensusIto En <2593> showed a sell indication. The company announced on the 1st that its consolidated operating profit for the first half of the fiscal year ending April 2026 (May-October) was 13.9 billion yen (down 3.2% year-on-year). The market consensus was 15.6 billion yen. Although there was an improvement in the profitability of the U.S. coffee bean business within its core leaf and drink-related business, the decrease in profit was impacted by rising costs for various raw materials, including green tea, its main ingredient.★9:00 GALA - Buy indication: Seriously embarking on new game development for the popular game "Ragnarok"GALA <4777> showed a buy indication. The company announced on the 1st that its subsidiary, Gala Lab Corp, has signed a collaboration agreement with Korean game developer Wemade Connect to develop a new project utilizing the global hit IP "Ragnarok," owned by Gravity (Korea). As a result, they have seriously embarked on the development of the new game title "Ragnarok Universe." Gala Lab Corp plans to leverage its global e-sports operational know-how, cultivated through the international e-sports tournament "FWC (Flyff World Championship)" for its flagship title "Flyff Universe," to develop "Ragnarok Universe" into a full-fledged global e-sports platform.★9:01 SE H&I - Buy indication: Share buyback up to 300,000 shares and 100 million yen, ratio is 1.91%SE Holdings and Incubation <9478> showed a buy indication. The company announced on the 1st that it has set up a share buyback framework with an upper limit of 300,000 shares and 100 million yen. The acquisition period is from December 2, 2025, to December 23, 2025. If the maximum number of shares is acquired, the ratio to the total number of outstanding shares excluding treasury stock will be 1.91%.★9:01 Toray - Rebounded: Price hikes, 60 billion yen profit increase effect by fiscal year ending March 2029 = NikkeiToray <3402> rebounded. The Nikkei Shimbun morning edition dated the 2nd reported that Mitsuo Ohya, President of the company, revealed that they expect a total profit increase effect of 60 billion yen by the fiscal year ending March 2029 through price measures such as price hikes. According to the article, this was revealed at a briefing held on the 1st. This is said to be an increase of 10 billion yen from the previous plan. While the sales volume of products is not expanding as much as expected, the company aims to improve profitability by raising prices.★9:01 FFJ - Buy indication: Delisting through MBO, TOB price is 2,315 yenFast Fitness Japan <7092> showed a buy indication. The company announced on the 1st that it has expressed its support for the tender offer for its shares by JG35 (Minato-ku, Tokyo), which is being conducted as part of a management buyout (MBO), and recommends shareholders to tender their shares in the tender offer. The tender offer price (for common shares) is 2,315 yen per share, and the tender offer period is from December 2, 2025, to January 20, 2025. The planned number of common shares to be purchased is 9,905,452 shares, with a minimum of 3,254,600 shares. No upper limit is set. After the completion of the TOB, the company's shares are expected to be delisted through a series of procedures. Hatao

headline: Morning Session Comment No.3 Resonac HD, Mitsukoshi Isetan, Panasonic H, H2O Retailing, Takashimaya, Yonex
description: Panasonic Holdings' subsidiary, Panasonic Energy, aims to quadruple sales of energy storage systems for data centers to 800 billion yen by fiscal year 2028, up from slightly less than 200 billion yen in fiscal year 2025. To meet this robust demand, the company plans to reallocate some production capacity from its domestic and international factories that manufacture batteries for EVs.
key_takeaways: Resonac HD is reducing its workforce at its German graphite electrode business base to cut fixed costs, with the impact already factored into its FY2025 earnings forecast.;Mitsukoshi Isetan's November domestic department store sales increased by 0.6% year-on-year, driven by strong sales of seasonal items and high-priced watches.;Panasonic Energy, a subsidiary of Panasonic HD, plans to quadruple sales of data center energy storage systems to 800 billion yen by FY2028, reallocating production capacity from EV batteries.;H2O Retailing and Takashimaya reported modest increases in November department store sales (3.6% and 3.5% respectively), though H2O noted a significant drop in tourist sales due to Japan-China tensions.;Yonex received an 'Outperform' rating and an increased target price of 4,000 yen from Tokai Tokyo Intelligence Lab, anticipating continued strong performance, especially in badminton and tennis products globally.
breaking_recap_reasoning: The article reports on a new strategic aim and plan by Panasonic Energy, as recently reported by the Nikkei Shimbun, which constitutes newly announced information.
source: トレーダーズ・ウェブ
news_worthy_reasoning: The article is a multi-company consolidation report, covering several Japanese companies. While it mentions a significant strategic shift for Panasonic Energy (a subsidiary of Panasonic HD) regarding data center energy storage, this information is presented as a brief point within a broader market summary. The article is not primarily dedicated to Panasonic Holdings Corp, and the content is diluted by updates on other companies, making it 'too noisy' for direct actionable intelligence for a trader focused solely on Panasonic.
news_worthy_key_factors: Multi-company consolidation article, Panasonic's news is a brief mention within a broader market update, Article is not primarily dedicated to PANASONIC HOLDINGS CORP, Content is diluted with other companies' news
original_headline: 前場コメント No.3　レゾナックＨＤ、ミツコシイセタン、パナソニックＨ、Ｈ２Ｏリテイル、高島屋、ヨネックス
main_content: 前場コメント No.3　レゾナックＨＤ、ミツコシイセタン、パナソニックＨ、Ｈ２Ｏリテイル、高島屋、ヨネックス11:31配信現在値三越伊勢丹2,332-129レゾナクＨ6,311-60パナソニク1,871-25.50高島屋1,656.5-10.50Ｈ２Ｏリテ2,106-38★9:04　 レゾナックＨＤ－反発　黒鉛電極事業で人員削減を決定レゾナック・ホールディングス<4004>が反発。同社は1日、孫会社が行う黒鉛電極事業に関して、当該事業のドイツ国内拠点の人員削減を決定したと発表した。黒鉛電極事業に関しては、需要動向が低迷する中、競合他社による低価格販売攻勢などにより事業環境が厳しく、グローバルに拠点閉鎖を含む一連の合理化策を推進してきたという。今回、欧州の独拠点においても固定費削減の為の人員削減を決定したとしている。2025年度の業績予想には施策実行に際し発生する費用および効果について、一定の前提の元に織り込んでおり、今回の決議による業績見通しの変更はないという。2026年度の業績見通しに関しては未作成であり、発生する費用および固定費などの費用削減効果については織り込んだ上でのガイダンス作成を行う方針としている。★9:04　 三越伊勢丹－反落　11月度の国内百貨店売上高0.6％増　国内グループ百貨店は1.1％減三越伊勢丹ホールディングス<3099>が反落。同社は1日、11月度の国内百貨店売上高は速報値で前年同月比0.6％増だったと発表した。このうち三越伊勢丹は同1.4％増、国内グループ百貨店は同1.1％減となった。気温の低下とともに、カシミヤなどの上質素材のコート・セーターやブルゾンといったシーズンアイテムが堅調に推移した。また、商品供給力に強みのある高額時計についても、国内、海外顧客ともに伸長したとしている。★9:04　 パナソニックＨＤ－底堅い　データセンター蓄電装置の売上高4倍目標　8000億円規模＝日経パナソニックホールディングス<6752>が底堅い。2日付の日本経済新聞朝刊は、同社傘下のパナソニックエナジが、データセンター向けの蓄電システムの売上高を2028年度をめどに現在の4倍の8000億円に伸ばすと報じた。記事によると、同社の25.3期のデータセンター用蓄電システムの売上高は2000億円弱で、26.3期は前期比1.7倍に拡大する見通し。データセンター向けの旺盛な需要に応えるため、EV向け電池を製造する国内外の工場の生産能力を一部振り向けるとしている。★9:05　 Ｈ２Ｏリテイリング－もみ合い　11月度の百貨店全店売上高3.6％増エイチ・ツー・オー リテイリング<8242>がもみ合い。同社は1日、11月度の百貨店事業における全店売上高は速報値で前年同月比3.6％増だったと発表した。都心店計、郊外店計、全店計いずれも前年の売上高を上回った。中国顧客の免税売上高は月間としては前年を上回ったが、日中関係の緊張の高まりの影響もあり、11月後半は海外VIP顧客以外のツーリスト客の売上高が約2割減と前年を大きく下回る推移だったとしている。★9:05　 高島屋－もみ合い　11月度の国内百貨店売上高3.5％増高島屋<8233>がもみ合い。同社は1日、11月度の国内百貨店売上高（速報値）は前年同月比3.5％増だったと発表した。免税売上高は同3.1％減となった。国内顧客は、気温の低下に伴いコートなどの冬物衣料に動きがみられた。インバウンド顧客については、化粧品、婦人服などが前年からプラスとなった一方、ラグジュアリーブランドをはじめとする高額品がマイナスとなった。★9:05　 ヨネックス－東海東京が目標株価引き上げ　ブランド認知度が向上し好調な業績が続く見通しヨネックス<7906>が4日ぶり反発。東海東京インテリジェンス・ラボでは、ブランド認知度が向上し好調な業績が続くと予想。レーティングは「Outperform」を継続し、目標株価を3200円→4000円に引き上げた。同社の26.3期上期（4-9月）業績は売上高795億円（前年同期比18.8％増）、営業利益88億円（同15.0％増）と前年比2ケタ増収増益だった。東海東京では、26.3期～28.3期業績予想を上方修正。アジアを中心としたバドミントン製品の伸びとグローバルでテニス製品の伸長を見込んでおり、中長期での堅調な業績推移を株価は十分に織り込んでいないとみている。畑尾
main_content_en: Morning Session Comment No. 3: Resonac HD, Mitsukoshi Isetan, Panasonic H, H2O Retailing, Takashimaya, Yonex. Current prices as of 11:31 JST: Mitsukoshi Isetan 2,332 -129, Resonac H 6,311 -60, Panasonic 1,871 -25.50, Takashimaya 1,656.5 -10.50, H2O Reta 2,106 -38. ★9:04 Resonac HD - Rebounds; Decides to reduce workforce in graphite electrode business. Resonac Holdings <4004> rebounded. The company announced on the 1st that it has decided to reduce the workforce at its German domestic base for the graphite electrode business conducted by its grandchild company. Regarding the graphite electrode business, the company stated that the business environment has been severe due to sluggish demand trends and aggressive low-price sales by competitors, leading it to promote a series of rationalization measures globally, including facility closures. This time, it has decided to reduce the workforce at its German base in Europe to cut fixed costs. The company states that the costs and effects arising from the implementation of these measures are incorporated into the FY2025 earnings forecast based on certain assumptions, and there will be no change to the earnings outlook due to this resolution. As for the FY2026 earnings outlook, it has not yet been prepared, and the company plans to create guidance after incorporating the costs incurred and the cost reduction effects such as fixed costs. ★9:04 Mitsukoshi Isetan - Falls back; November domestic department store sales up 0.6%, domestic group department stores down 1.1%. Mitsukoshi Isetan Holdings <3099> fell back. The company announced on the 1st that its domestic department store sales for November, on a preliminary basis, increased by 0.6% year-on-year. Of these, Mitsukoshi Isetan's sales increased by 1.4%, while domestic group department stores saw a 1.1% decrease. With the drop in temperature, seasonal items such as coats, sweaters, and blousons made of high-quality materials like cashmere performed strongly. Furthermore, high-priced watches, where the company has strong product supply capabilities, saw growth among both domestic and international customers. ★9:04 Panasonic HD - Firm; Aims to quadruple sales of data center energy storage devices to 800 billion yen scale = Nikkei. Panasonic Holdings <6752> remained firm. The Nikkei Shimbun morning edition dated the 2nd reported that Panasonic Energy, a subsidiary of the company, aims to increase sales of energy storage systems for data centers to 800 billion yen by FY2028, quadrupling current sales. According to the article, the company's sales of energy storage systems for data centers in the fiscal year ending March 2025 were slightly less than 200 billion yen, and are expected to expand 1.7 times year-on-year in the fiscal year ending March 2026. To meet the robust demand for data centers, the company plans to reallocate some production capacity from its domestic and international factories that manufacture batteries for EVs. ★9:05 H2O Retailing - Trading flat; November department store total sales up 3.6%. H2O Retailing <8242> traded flat. The company announced on the 1st that its total department store sales for November, on a preliminary basis, increased by 3.6% year-on-year. Sales at urban stores, suburban stores, and all stores combined all exceeded the previous year's figures. While duty-free sales to Chinese customers exceeded the previous year on a monthly basis, the company stated that sales to tourist customers other than overseas VIPs significantly fell below the previous year in the latter half of November, decreasing by approximately 20%, partly due to rising tensions in Japan-China relations. ★9:05 Takashimaya - Trading flat; November domestic department store sales up 3.5%. Takashimaya <8233> traded flat. The company announced on the 1st that its domestic department store sales for November (preliminary figures) increased by 3.5% year-on-year. Duty-free sales decreased by 3.1%. Domestic customers showed movement in winter clothing such as coats due to the drop in temperature. For inbound customers, cosmetics and women's clothing saw positive growth compared to the previous year, while high-priced items, including luxury brands, saw negative growth. ★9:05 Yonex - Tokai Tokyo raises target price; Brand recognition improves, strong performance expected to continue. Yonex <7906> rebounded for the first time in four days. Tokai Tokyo Intelligence Lab expects brand recognition to improve and strong performance to continue. It maintained its "Outperform" rating and raised its target price from 3,200 yen to 4,000 yen. The company's performance for the first half of the fiscal year ending March 2026 (April-September) showed double-digit increases in both revenue and operating profit year-on-year, with sales of 79.5 billion yen (up 18.8% year-on-year) and operating profit of 8.8 billion yen (up 15.0% year-on-year). Tokai Tokyo revised upward its earnings forecasts for the fiscal years ending March 2026 to March 2028. It anticipates growth in badminton products, particularly in Asia, and an increase in tennis products globally, believing that the stock price has not fully factored in the solid medium-to-long-term performance trend. Hatao

headline: <Special Quote> Canon Electronics, BRANU, FANUC have buy indications
description: FANUC is listed among companies showing special bid quotes, with its current price at 5,417, up 379, and is noted for raising its bid quotes.
key_takeaways: Canon Elec, iole, Perseus, Yaskawa Electric, FANUC, and BRANU are showing strong special bid quotes, suggesting potential price increases.;Canon Elec, which hit a daily limit high yesterday, continues to attract significant buy orders totaling 10.6 billion yen.;Immuno-Biological Laboratories, Daikokuya, BTCJPN, Ito En, VIX ETF, and Image Information are experiencing strong special ask quotes, indicating potential price declines.;Immuno-Biological Laboratories, after hitting a daily limit high yesterday, has reversed course with substantial sell orders of 4.09 billion yen.;As of 9:03:35 AM JST on December 2nd, there were 14 stocks with special bid quotes and 10 with special ask quotes.
breaking_recap_reasoning: The article reports on current special bid and ask quotes for various stocks, explicitly stating the publication time and current market data as of a specific minute, using phrases like 'today,' 'is raising,' and 'is lowering' to describe newly observed market movements.
news_worthy_reasoning: The article is a multi-company market summary reporting real-time bid/ask quotes for several stocks, including FANUC. While it notes strong buying interest for FANUC, it provides no company-specific news, fundamental developments, or reasons behind this market activity. It lacks the depth and focus on FANUC to be considered actionable intelligence for trading based on corporate events.
news_worthy_key_factors: Multi-company consolidation: FANUC is one of many companies mentioned in a broad market overview., Lack of company-specific fundamental news: No corporate actions, earnings, new products, or strategic changes are reported for FANUC., Market observation, not a news event: The article reports real-time market bid/ask quotes, which is a technical observation, not a specific corporate development., Diluted content: FANUC's mention is brief and part of a broader market snapshot, not a dedicated analysis.
original_headline: ＜特別気配＞　キヤノン電、ＢＲＡＮＵ、ファナックが買い気配
main_content: ＜特別気配＞　キヤノン電、ＢＲＡＮＵ、ファナックが買い気配 9:04 配信 キヤノン電　＜日足＞　「株探」多機能チャートより 現在値 イオレ 443 + 12 ペルセウス 301 -3 安川電 4,216 + 192 ファナック 5,417 + 379 キヤノン電 3,640 + 380.00 12月2日9時03分35秒現在、特別買い気配は14銘柄、特別売り気配は10銘柄となっている。 前日ストップ高したキヤノン電 < 7739 > は本日も106億円とトップの買い注文(売りは2億円)を集めて特別買い気配を切り上げている。イオレ < 2334 > やペルセウス < 4882 > も買いが売りを大幅に上回る注文が入っており、買い気配を切り上げてストップ高まで買い進まれる可能性がある。 そのほか、安川電 < 6506 > やファナック < 6954 > 、ＢＲＡＮＵ < 460A > も買い気配を切り上げている。 一方、前日ストップ高を演じた免疫生物研 < 4570 > は一転して本日は40.9億円とトップの売り注文(買いは4.6億円)を集めて特別売り気配を切り下げている。大黒屋 < 6993 > やＢＴＣＪＰＮ < 8105 > も売りが買いを大幅に上回る注文が入っており、売り気配を切り下げてストップ安まで売り込まれる可能性がある。 そのほか、伊藤園 < 2593 > やＶＩＸＥＴＦ < 318A > 、イメージ情報 < 3803 > も売り気配を切り下げている。
main_content_en: Special Bid Quotes: Canon Elec, BRANU, FANUC Show Special Bid Quotes (Published 9:04 AM JST) Canon Elec <Daily Chart> From "Kabutan" Multi-functional Chart. Current Prices: iole 443 + 12, Perseus 301 -3, Yaskawa Electric 4,216 + 192, FANUC 5,417 + 379, Canon Elec 3,640 + 380.00. As of 9:03:35 AM on December 2nd, there are 14 stocks with special bid quotes and 10 stocks with special ask quotes. Canon Electronics <7739>, which hit its daily limit high yesterday, today also gathered the top buy orders of 10.6 billion yen (sell orders were 200 million yen) and is raising its special bid quote. iole <2334> and Perseus <4882> also have orders where bids significantly exceed asks, and there is a possibility that their bid quotes will be raised, leading to buying up to the daily limit high. In addition, Yaskawa Electric <6506>, FANUC <6954>, and BRANU <460A> are also raising their bid quotes. On the other hand, Immuno-Biological Laboratories <4570>, which hit its daily limit high yesterday, has, in a reversal, gathered the top sell orders of 4.09 billion yen today (buy orders were 460 million yen) and is lowering its special ask quote. Daikokuya <6993> and BTCJPN <8105> also have orders where asks significantly exceed bids, and there is a possibility that their ask quotes will be lowered, leading to selling down to the daily limit low. Furthermore, Ito En <2593>, VIX ETF <318A>, and Image Information <3803> are also lowering their ask quotes.

headline: <Stocks in Focus on 1st> Mitsubishi Heavy Industries, Mitsubishi Shipbuilding with Imabari Shipbuilding, etc., Memorandum of Understanding for establishing a standard design framework for next-generation alternative fuel ships
description: Mitsubishi Heavy Industries announced that its group company, Mitsubishi Shipbuilding, signed a Memorandum of Understanding with six other companies to establish a standard design framework for developing next-generation alternative fuel ships, including LCO2 carriers and those utilizing decarbonization technologies. This initiative aims to realize the development and initial design of internationally competitive ships.
key_takeaways: Seven major Japanese companies, led by Mitsubishi Heavy Industries and Mitsubishi Shipbuilding, have formed an alliance to standardize the design of next-generation alternative fuel ships.;The initiative focuses on developing efficient and competitive designs for vessels utilizing liquefied carbon dioxide (LCO2) carriers and alternative fuels such as ammonia.;The collaboration aims to streamline the initial design process, enhance international competitiveness, and potentially expand to include more domestic shipyards and vessel types.;The participating companies include shipbuilders (Mitsubishi Shipbuilding, Imabari Shipbuilding, Japan Marine United, Nihon Shipyard) and shipping lines (Kawasaki Kisen Kaisha, Mitsui O.S.K. Lines, Nippon Yusen Kaisha).;Mitsubishi Heavy Industries' stock closed at 3,902 yen on the day of the announcement, down 45 yen from the previous weekend.
breaking_recap_reasoning: The article reports a newly announced event, specifically Mitsubishi Heavy Industries' group company signing a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) with several other companies, explicitly stating it was "announced on the 1st".
source: ウエルスアドバイザー
news_worthy_reasoning: The article details a strategic Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) led by Mitsubishi Heavy Industries with major industry players to develop standard designs for next-generation alternative fuel ships. This represents a significant move into a future-critical market segment (decarbonization in shipping), indicating potential for new revenue streams, enhanced competitiveness, and leadership in sustainable technologies. This is a concrete, recent, and company-focused development with clear long-term implications.
news_worthy_key_factors: Strategic partnership with multiple major industry players (shipbuilders and shipping lines)., Focus on next-generation alternative fuel ships (LCO2, ammonia), aligning with global decarbonization trends., Potential for enhanced international competitiveness and future market share in a growing sector., Direct involvement and leadership by Mitsubishi Heavy Industries in a key industry initiative.
actionable_intelligence: This news suggests a positive long-term strategic direction for Mitsubishi Heavy Industries, positioning it for growth in the sustainable shipping sector. Traders could monitor for further developments, potential contracts, or government support related to this initiative, which could positively impact the stock price over time as the initiative progresses and secures business.
original_headline: ＜１日の動意株＞菱重工、三菱造船が今治造船などと次世代代替燃料船の標準設計フレームワーク確立で覚書
main_content: 三菱重工業は１日、グループの三菱造船が、今治造船（愛媛県今治市）、川崎汽船、商船三井、日本郵船、ジャパンマリンユナイテッド（神奈川県横浜市）、日本シップヤード（東京都千代田区）と、液化二酸化炭素（ＬＣＯ２）運搬船および脱炭素技術（アンモニア燃料など）を活用した、次世代代替燃料船の初期設計を効率的に開発・実施するための標準設計フレームワークを確立するための覚書を締結したと発表した。７社は、標準設計スキームの構築を通じ、国内の造船所とともに、国際競争力のある船舶の開発・初期設計の実現を目指す。参画する国内の造船所の拡大を図るとともに、事業環境に応じて、対象船の拡大などを検討するとしている。１日の終値は、前週末比４５円安の３９０２円。
main_content_en: Mitsubishi Heavy Industries announced on the 1st that its group company, Mitsubishi Shipbuilding, signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) with Imabari Shipbuilding (Imabari City, Ehime Prefecture), Kawasaki Kisen Kaisha, Mitsui O.S.K. Lines, Nippon Yusen Kaisha, Japan Marine United (Yokohama City, Kanagawa Prefecture), and Nihon Shipyard (Chiyoda Ward, Tokyo) to establish a standard design framework for efficiently developing and implementing the initial design of next-generation alternative fuel ships, utilizing liquefied carbon dioxide (LCO2) carriers and decarbonization technologies (such as ammonia fuel). The seven companies, through the establishment of a standard design scheme, aim to realize the development and initial design of internationally competitive ships, together with domestic shipyards. They also plan to expand the number of participating domestic shipyards and, depending on the business environment, consider expanding the scope of target vessels and other related matters. The closing price on the 1st was 3,902 yen, down 45 yen from the previous weekend's close.

headline: FANUC's popularity accelerates, officially entering the physical AI field in collaboration with US NVIDIA
description: FANUC CORP is experiencing accelerated buying popularity and its sixth consecutive day of gains after announcing a collaboration with NVIDIA. This partnership aims to capture the 'Physical AI' trend, leveraging FANUC's position as a top manufacturer of NC devices and industrial robots for business expansion.
key_takeaways: FANUC's stock has seen strong buying interest, extending its gains for a sixth consecutive day.;FANUC announced a strategic collaboration with NVIDIA to advance in the 'Physical AI' sector.;The partnership focuses on integrating artificial intelligence with robots for autonomous operation.;FANUC, a top manufacturer of NC devices and industrial robots, aims to expand its business significantly through this initiative.;The announcement has been met with positive surprise, attracting large-scale buying from institutional investors.
breaking_recap_reasoning: The article's main focus is the newly announced collaboration with NVIDIA, which occurred 'the previous day' and is presented as a 'positive surprise' driving current market activity.
news_worthy_reasoning: The article reports a strategic partnership between FANUC and NVIDIA to enter the high-growth 'Physical AI' field, which is a major new product/technology development. This collaboration has already generated significant positive investor interest and stock price momentum, indicating clear actionable intelligence for traders.
news_worthy_key_factors: Strategic partnership with NVIDIA, a major technology company, Entry into the 'Physical AI' field (AI + robotics) which is a key global technology trend, Immediate positive market reaction, including accelerated buying and institutional investor interest, New product/technology development with potential for significant business expansion
actionable_intelligence: The news indicates a strong positive catalyst for FANUC's stock due to strategic growth and market interest. Traders could consider a long position or monitor for continued upward momentum, especially given the reported institutional buying.
original_headline: ファナックが物色人気加速、米エヌビディアと協業しフィジカルＡＩ分野に本格参入
main_content: ファナックが物色人気加速。朝方カイ気配で始まる人気となり、きょうで６連騰と上げ足を強めている。同社は前日に東京都内で開催した技術発表会で米半導体大手エヌビディア <NVDA> と協業することを明らかにした。同社は工作機械用ＮＣ装置の世界トップメーカーで産業用ロボットでも屈指の商品競争力を誇る。現在、人工知能（ＡＩ）とロボットを融合させ自律的に作動させる「フィジカルＡＩ」が世界的にテーマ視されており、同社はエヌビディアとの連携でその流れを捉え、業容拡大に本腰を入れる構えだ。これがポジティブサプライズとなり機関投資家などの大口買いを呼び込む格好となっている。
main_content_en: FANUC's buying popularity accelerates. It started with strong buying interest in the morning, and today marks its sixth consecutive day of gains, strengthening its upward momentum. The company announced its collaboration with US semiconductor giant NVIDIA <NVDA> at a technology presentation held in Tokyo the previous day. The company is the world's top manufacturer of NC devices for machine tools and boasts outstanding product competitiveness in industrial robots. Currently, 'Physical AI,' which integrates artificial intelligence (AI) and robots to operate autonomously, is globally recognized as a key theme. The company, through its partnership with NVIDIA, aims to capture this trend and is poised to seriously commit to business expansion. This has become a positive surprise, attracting large-scale buying from institutional investors and others.

headline: [Analyst Rating] SMC, rating maintained at Strong Buy, target price raised to 63,500 yen (Major US Securities Firm)
description: SMC CORP received a maintained "Bullish" rating from a major US brokerage firm, which also raised its target price from 53,000 yen to 63,500 yen. This update comes amidst a consensus "Slightly Bullish" rating from 12 analysts.
key_takeaways: A major US brokerage firm maintained a "Bullish" (Buy (1)) rating on SMC (6273).;The target price for SMC was raised from 53,000 yen to 63,500 yen.;The new target price of 63,500 yen is above the current consensus target price of 58,517 yen.;The consensus rating from 12 analysts as of November 28 was "Slightly Bullish" (3.83).
breaking_recap_reasoning: The article reports a specific, new event: a major securities firm updated its target price for SMC CORP on December 1st. This constitutes a new rating change, which is explicitly defined as 'breaking' information.
news_worthy_reasoning: The article reports a recent and substantial increase in the target price for SMC by a major US brokerage firm. This new target price is significantly higher than both the previous target and the current analyst consensus, indicating a strong positive outlook that could influence investor sentiment and stock price in the near term.
news_worthy_key_factors: Significant increase in target price (from 53,000 yen to 63,500 yen), New target price exceeds current analyst consensus (63,500 yen vs. 58,517 yen), Rating maintained as 'Bullish' by a major US brokerage firm, Timely information (December 1st event)
actionable_intelligence: Traders could interpret the significantly raised target price and maintained 'Bullish' rating from a major brokerage firm as a strong positive signal, potentially leading to increased buying interest or a re-evaluation of existing positions in SMC shares, anticipating upward price movement.
original_headline: 【アナリスト評価】ＳＭＣ、レーティング強気を継続、目標株価63,500円に引上げ（米系大手証券）
main_content: 米系大手証券が12月1日、ＳＭＣ < 6273 > のレーティングを強気（買い(1)）に据え置いた。一方、目標株価は53,000円から63,500円に引き上げた。因みに前日（11月28日）時点のレーティングコンセンサスは3.83（アナリスト数12人）で「やや強気」の水準、目標株価コンセンサスは58,517円（アナリスト数12人）となっている。
main_content_en: A major US brokerage firm on December 1st maintained its rating on SMC < 6273 > as "Bullish" (Buy (1)). Meanwhile, the target price was raised from 53,000 yen to 63,500 yen. Incidentally, as of the previous day (November 28), the consensus rating was 3.83 (12 analysts), indicating a "Slightly Bullish" level, and the consensus target price was 58,517 yen (12 analysts).

headline: [Analyst Forecast] HOYA, FY26 March ordinary profit forecast. Up 0.2% from previous week.
description: HOYA CORP's ordinary profit forecast for FY2026 March increased by 0.2% from the previous week, reaching 286,937 million yen. The company's rating consensus remained unchanged at 4.7.
key_takeaways: HOYA's ordinary profit forecast for FY2026 March increased by 0.2% from the prior week.;The updated consensus forecast for ordinary profit is 286,937 million yen.;The previous week's forecast was 286,242 million yen.;The rating consensus for HOYA remained unchanged at 4.7.
breaking_recap_reasoning: The article reports a specific, recent update to HOYA CORP's analyst consensus ordinary profit forecast for the March 2026 fiscal year, noting a 0.2% increase from the previous week. This constitutes new information regarding market expectations, rather than a summary of past events.
news_worthy_reasoning: The article reports a very minor (0.2%) upward revision in HOYA's ordinary profit forecast for FY2026 March. This small change for a future fiscal year is unlikely to have any significant impact on the stock price in the near term and does not constitute actionable intelligence for traders. The rating consensus also remained stable.
news_worthy_key_factors: Extremely minor forecast revision (0.2%), Forecast is for a distant future fiscal year (FY2026 March), Rating consensus remained stable, Lack of immediate impact on stock price
original_headline: 【アナリスト予想】ＨＯＹＡ、26年3月期経常予想。対前週0.2%上昇。
main_content: 【アナリスト予想】ＨＯＹＡ、26年3月期経常予想。対前週0.2%上昇。ＨＯＹＡ<7741>の経常利益予想コンセンサスは、前週値の286,242百万円から0.2%上昇し、286,937百万円となった。因みにレーティングコンセンサスは4.7で変わらずのまま。
main_content_en: [Analyst Forecast] HOYA, FY2026 March Ordinary Profit Forecast. Up 0.2% from previous week. The consensus forecast for HOYA's<7741> ordinary profit increased by 0.2% from the previous week's value of 286,242 million yen to 286,937 million yen. Incidentally, the rating consensus remained unchanged at 4.7.

headline: Hot Stocks Pick-up [Evening Edition] (2): MTG, Mitsubishi Electric, Murata Manufacturing
description: Mitsubishi Electric plans to triple its production capacity for semiconductors used in data centers and communication base stations by fiscal year 2028 compared to fiscal year 2024. This expansion involves reallocating some investments from power semiconductors.
key_takeaways: Eucareer's stock rebounded following its subsidiary MediStep's acquisition of Liliful, aiming to strengthen home nursing services.;MTG received an upgraded target stock price from SMBC Nikko Securities, citing favorable brand development and projected 20% annual operating profit growth.;LA Holdings' net profit forecast for FY2025 was raised from 5.1 billion yen to 6 billion yen, despite a sales forecast reduction, indicating improved profitability from high-value real estate projects.;Mitsubishi Electric plans to triple its semiconductor production capacity by FY2028, focusing on data centers and communication base stations.;Murata Manufacturing anticipates a 30% average annual growth in AI server capacitor demand from 2025 to 2030 and has developed a new world's largest capacitance multilayer ceramic capacitor.
breaking_recap_reasoning: The article reports a new strategic decision by Mitsubishi Electric to triple its semiconductor production capacity by fiscal year 2028, which was reported by the Nikkei on the 2nd and influenced the stock price on the same day. This constitutes new, forward-looking information likely not yet fully priced in by the market.
news_worthy_reasoning: The article is a multi-company stock pick-up, summarizing news for several companies including Mitsubishi Electric. While the information about Mitsubishi Electric's semiconductor capacity expansion is a specific and potentially impactful event, the article is not primarily dedicated to the company. It falls under the 'Multi-Company Consolidation' and 'Too Noisy' criteria for insignificance, as the actionable intelligence is diluted by other company news and presented as a brief highlight.
news_worthy_key_factors: Multi-company consolidation article, not company-focused on Mitsubishi Electric., Content is a summary/derivative of other news, not an in-depth report., Mitsubishi Electric's news is one of several bullet points, making it 'too noisy' for direct actionable intelligence from this source.
original_headline: 話題株ピックアップ【夕刊】（2）：ＭＴＧ、三菱電、村田製
main_content: ■ユカリア<286A>890円 +23 円 (+2.7％) 本日終値ユカリア<286A>が反発。１日の取引終了後、子会社で訪問看護や居宅介護支援を手掛けるメディステップが訪問介護や障害の居宅介護を営むリリフル（東京都品川区）を完全子会社化したと発表しており、将来的な業績への貢献を期待した買いが集まった。メディステップはリリフルが持つ小児・難病分野における看護の専門的な知見と実践ノウハウを生かし、対象疾患や年齢層を問わず包括的に支援できる訪問看護体制について強化を進める。■ＭＴＧ<7806>4,405円 +105 円 (+2.4％) 本日終値ＭＴＧ<7806>は３日ぶりに反発した。ＳＭＢＣ日興証券が１日、ＭＴＧの目標株価を６３００円から６７００円に増額修正した。投資評価は３段階で最上位の「１」を継続する。旗艦ブランド「ＲｅＦａ」をはじめ、全方位でブランド育成が好調に推移していると指摘。今後５年間の営業利益の年平均成長率（ＣＡＧＲ）はプラス２０％と想定し、中期的な拡大が継続するとの見方を示す。同証券はＭＴＧの２７年９月期営業利益予想をこれまでの１５０億円から１７５億円に引き上げた。■ＬＡホールディングス<2986>7,590円 +140 円 (+1.9％) 本日終値ＬＡホールディングス<2986>は朝安後持ち直した。２日午前１０時３０分ごろ、２５年１２月期の通期業績予想の修正を発表した。売上高予想を５１０億円から４６０億円（前期比２．９％増）に引き下げた一方、最終利益予想を５１億円から６０億円（同２７．３％増）に引き上げた。利益予想の増額を評価した買いが優勢となった。都心部の好立地エリアや地方中核都市を中心に不動産開発の事業の高付加価値化を追求し、収益性が向上する。販売計画を見直し一部プロジェクトを来期以降としたことにより、売上高予想については下方修正した。同時に期末配当予想を従来の見通しから２円増額し１７０円に修正。年間配当予想は３３５円（前期は２９２円）となる。■三菱電機<6503>4,300円 +67 円 (+1.6％) 本日終値三菱電機<6503>が後場に強含んだ。日本経済新聞電子版が２日、「三菱電機はデータセンターや通信基地局で使われる半導体を増産する」と報じ、手掛かりとなったようだ。記事によると、パワー半導体向け投資の一部を振り向けることなどを通じ、２０２８年度の生産能力を２４年度比で３倍にするという。■村田製作所<6981>3,272円 +48 円 (+1.5％) 本日終値村田製作所<6981>が堅調推移。同社は１日に２０２５年の「ＩＲ Ｄａｙ」を開催。会社説明会の資料をホームページ上に公開した。このなかでＡＩサーバーへのコンデンサー搭載数について、昨年の中期経営方針公表時の１万～２万個から１万５０００～２万５０００個に見直し、ＡＩサーバー向けコンデンサー需要に関して２５～３０年の年平均成長率が３０％となるとの見通しを示している。同社の中期的な成長を支える要因となるとの期待が改めて膨らむ形となり、買いを誘ったようだ。なお、同社は２日、３．２ミリメートル×２．５ミリメートルのサイズで定格電圧１．２５キロボルト、Ｃ０Ｇ特性を備えた世界最大の静電容量の積層セラミックコンデンサーを開発し、量産を開始したと発表している。■ゼンショＨＤ<7550>9,336円 +131 円 (+1.4％) 本日終値ゼンショーホールディングス<7550>が底堅く推移。同社は１日、１１月の「すき家」の既存店売上高が前年同月比１３．１％増となったと発表した。伸び率は１０月の４．２％から拡大した。既存店の客数は同４．８％増と、今年２月以来、９カ月ぶりに前年同月を上回っており、株価のサポート要因となったようだ。全店売上高は同１５．８％増となった。■ＩＢＪ<6071>758円 +10 円 (+1.3％) 本日終値ＩＢＪ<6071>が底堅い。同社は１日の取引終了後、結婚相談所事業の１１月の月次ＫＰＩ（重要業績評価指標）について開示した。課金会員数は前年同月比４１．９％増の９万８３６４人と大幅に伸長し、１０万人に接近。開示内容が評価されたようだ。新規入会者数は同１４．８％増の６６７１人。登録会員数全体では同９．３％増の１０万４６７３人だった。婚活をテーマとする番組「Ｔｈｅ Ｍａｒｒｉａｇｅ Ｐｒｏｊｅｃｔ」のＹｏｕＴｕｂｅ配信を始め、公開から約２週間で再生回数が２０万回を突破した。同社は社会的な関心の高まりが事業の追い風になっているとしたうえで、年末にかけて例年、成婚数が増加する傾向にあり、引き続きＫＰＩや業績は順調に推移するとの見通しを示している。■ビーエンジ<4828>7,690円 +90 円 (+1.2％) 本日終値ビジネスエンジニアリング<4828>が反発し、上場来高値を更新した。同社は１日、製薬業界向けの製造実行システム（ＭＥＳ）を提供するタイのＢａｔｃｈＬｉｎｅに資本参加すると発表。１億円相当を出資する予定だとしており、これが材料視されたようだ。ビーエンジは今年１月にＢａｔｃｈＬｉｎｅとパートナーシップ契約を締結し、３月から同社のＢａｔｃｈＬｉｎｅ ＭＥＳを国内で提供している。ビーエンジは今回の資本参加により、グローバル市場における医薬品製造業のデジタルトランスフォーメーション（ＤＸ）に向けて、製造記録電子化ソリューションの提供体制を強化するとしている。■大阪ガス<9532>5,476円 +58 円 (+1.1％) 本日終値大阪ガス<9532>は底堅く推移。同社はこの日、伊藤忠商事<8001>や東邦ガス<9533>、海外エネルギー企業らと、米国ネブラスカ州における合成メタン製造事業の基本設計（ＦＥＥＤ）実施に向けた共同開発契約を締結したと発表した。同事業では２０２７年度内の最終投資意思決定（ＦＩＤ）の実施、３０年度中の合成メタンの製造（製造容量：年間約７万５０００トン）開始と日本への輸出を目指す。大ガスと邦ガスは同事業から合成メタンを輸入する。■コカＢＪＨ<2579>2,868円 +24.5 円 (+0.9％) 本日終値コカ・コーラ ボトラーズジャパンホールディングス<2579>がしっかり。同社は１日、「綾鷹」ブランドの緑茶製品の値上げを発表。今後の収益への好影響を期待した買いが株価を下支えした。メーカー希望小売価格に対する改定率はプラス６．３％～１２．１％。改定日は２０２６年３月１日。製品に使用する茶葉の価格が高騰し、飲料業界全体として更なるコスト上昇が見込まれる状況のなか、改めて価格改定に踏み切る。
main_content_en: Eucareer <286A> 890 yen +23 yen (+2.7%) Closing price today. Eucareer <286A> rebounded. After the close of trading on the 1st, it announced that MediStep, its subsidiary engaged in home nursing and in-home care support, had made Liliful (Shinagawa-ku, Tokyo), which operates home care and in-home care for people with disabilities, a wholly-owned subsidiary. This led to buying activity in anticipation of future earnings contributions. MediStep will leverage Liliful's specialized nursing knowledge and practical know-how in the pediatric and intractable disease fields to strengthen its home nursing system, enabling comprehensive support regardless of target disease or age group. MTG <7806> 4,405 yen +105 yen (+2.4%) Closing price today. MTG <7806> rebounded for the first time in three days. SMBC Nikko Securities revised MTG's target stock price upward from 6,300 yen to 6,700 yen on the 1st. The investment rating remains at '1', the highest of three levels. It pointed out that brand development is progressing favorably across the board, including its flagship brand 'ReFa'. It assumes an average annual growth rate (CAGR) of operating profit of +20% over the next five years, indicating continued medium-term expansion. The same securities firm raised MTG's operating profit forecast for the fiscal year ending September 2027 from the previous 15 billion yen to 17.5 billion yen. LA Holdings <2986> 7,590 yen +140 yen (+1.9%) Closing price today. LA Holdings <2986> recovered after an early morning dip. Around 10:30 AM on the 2nd, it announced a revision to its full-year earnings forecast for the fiscal year ending December 2025. While the sales forecast was lowered from 51 billion yen to 46 billion yen (up 2.9% year-on-year), the net profit forecast was raised from 5.1 billion yen to 6 billion yen (up 27.3% year-on-year). Buying activity, driven by the upward revision of the profit forecast, became dominant. Profitability is improving as the company pursues higher value-added real estate development projects, primarily in prime locations in urban centers and core regional cities. The sales forecast was revised downward due to a review of sales plans, with some projects pushed to the next fiscal year and beyond. At the same time, the year-end dividend forecast was revised upward by 2 yen from the previous outlook to 170 yen. The annual dividend forecast is 335 yen (292 yen in the previous fiscal year). Mitsubishi Electric <6503> 4,300 yen +67 yen (+1.6%) Closing price today. Mitsubishi Electric <6503> strengthened in the afternoon session. The Nikkei Shimbun Digital Edition reported on the 2nd that 'Mitsubishi Electric will increase production of semiconductors used in data centers and communication base stations,' which seems to have provided a catalyst. According to the article, the company plans to triple its production capacity by fiscal year 2028 compared to fiscal year 2024, partly by reallocating some investments from power semiconductors. Murata Manufacturing <6981> 3,272 yen +48 yen (+1.5%) Closing price today. Murata Manufacturing <6981> showed solid performance. The company held its 'IR Day' for 2025 on the 1st. It published the presentation materials from the company briefing on its website. In these materials, it revised the number of capacitors installed in AI servers from 10,000-20,000 units at the time of last year's medium-term management policy announcement to 15,000-25,000 units, and indicated a forecast of a 30% average annual growth rate for AI server capacitor demand from 2025 to 2030. Expectations that this will be a factor supporting the company's medium-term growth swelled again, seemingly attracting buyers. Furthermore, the company announced on the 2nd that it has developed and started mass production of a multilayer ceramic capacitor with the world's largest capacitance, measuring 3.2 mm x 2.5 mm, with a rated voltage of 1.25 kV and C0G characteristics. Zensho Holdings <7550> 9,336 yen +131 yen (+1.4%) Closing price today. Zensho Holdings <7550> showed resilient performance. The company announced on the 1st that existing store sales for 'Sukiya' in November increased by 13.1% year-on-year. The growth rate expanded from 4.2% in October. The number of existing store customers increased by 4.8% year-on-year, surpassing the previous year's same month for the first time in nine months since February this year, which seems to have been a supporting factor for the stock price. Total store sales increased by 15.8% year-on-year. IBJ <6071> 758 yen +10 yen (+1.3%) Closing price today. IBJ <6071> showed resilience. After the close of trading on the 1st, the company disclosed its monthly KPIs (Key Performance Indicators) for its marriage agency business for November. The number of paying members significantly increased by 41.9% year-on-year to 98,364, approaching 100,000. The disclosed content seems to have been well-received. The number of new members increased by 14.8% year-on-year to 6,671. The total number of registered members was 104,673, up 9.3% year-on-year. The YouTube distribution of the matchmaking-themed program 'The Marriage Project' began, and views surpassed 200,000 in approximately two weeks since its release. The company stated that increasing social interest is a tailwind for its business, and with the number of successful marriages tending to increase towards the year-end, it expects KPIs and performance to continue to progress favorably. Business Engineering <4828> 7,690 yen +90 yen (+1.2%) Closing price today. Business Engineering <4828> rebounded and updated its all-time high. The company announced on the 1st that it would make an equity investment in BatchLine, a Thai company that provides Manufacturing Execution Systems (MES) for the pharmaceutical industry. It plans to invest the equivalent of 100 million yen, which seems to have been regarded as a positive factor. Business Engineering concluded a partnership agreement with BatchLine in January this year and has been providing BatchLine MES in Japan since March. Through this equity investment, Business Engineering aims to strengthen its provision system for electronic manufacturing record solutions, contributing to the digital transformation (DX) of the pharmaceutical manufacturing industry in the global market. Osaka Gas <9532> 5,476 yen +58 yen (+1.1%) Closing price today. Osaka Gas <9532> showed resilient performance. The company announced today that it has concluded a joint development agreement with Itochu Corporation <8001>, Toho Gas <9533>, and other overseas energy companies to conduct a Front-End Engineering Design (FEED) for a synthetic methane production project in Nebraska, USA. The project aims to make a Final Investment Decision (FID) by fiscal year 2027, start synthetic methane production (production capacity: approximately 75,000 tons per year) by fiscal year 2030, and export it to Japan. Osaka Gas and Toho Gas will import synthetic methane from this project. Coca-Cola Bottlers Japan Holdings <2579> 2,868 yen +24.5 yen (+0.9%) Closing price today. Coca-Cola Bottlers Japan Holdings <2579> held firm. The company announced on the 1st a price increase for its 'Ayataka' brand green tea products. Buying activity, anticipating a positive impact on future earnings, supported the stock price. The revision rate for the manufacturer's suggested retail price is +6.3% to 12.1%. The revision date is March 1, 2026. Amid soaring prices for tea leaves used in products and expectations of further cost increases across the beverage industry, the company is once again implementing a price revision.

headline: [Analyst Rating] Shiseido, Rating Neutral maintained, Target price lowered to 2,130 yen (Major Japanese Securities Firm)
description: A major Japanese securities firm maintained its Neutral rating on Shiseido but lowered its target price from 2,340 yen to 2,130 yen. This updated target price is below the consensus target of 2,504 yen, though the consensus rating for Shiseido remains Neutral.
key_takeaways: A major Japanese securities firm maintained a 'Neutral' rating on Shiseido (4911).;The target price for Shiseido was lowered from 2,340 yen to 2,130 yen.;The new target price of 2,130 yen is lower than the consensus target price of 2,504 yen from 10 analysts.;The consensus rating for Shiseido remains at a 'Neutral' level of 2.8.
breaking_recap_reasoning: The article is primarily about analyst ratings and target price adjustments, which, according to the hard rule, must be classified as RECAP_NEWS even with specific timing mentioned.
news_worthy_reasoning: The article reports a major Japanese securities firm lowering its target price for Shiseido, a specific and recent event. This revised target price is also below the analyst consensus, providing actionable intelligence that could negatively impact investor sentiment and stock price.
news_worthy_key_factors: Lowered target price by a major securities firm, New target price is below the consensus target price, Specific and recent analyst action (December 2), Directly focused on SHISEIDO LTD
actionable_intelligence: Traders might interpret the lowered target price, especially one below consensus, as a negative signal, potentially leading to a re-evaluation of long positions, considering short positions, or adjusting entry/exit points based on the revised outlook.
original_headline: 【アナリスト評価】資生堂、レーティング中立を据置き、目標株価2,130円に引下げ（日系大手証券）
main_content: 日系大手証券が12月2日、資生堂 < 4911 > のレーティングを中立（3）に据え置いた。一方、目標株価は2,340円から2,130円に引き下げた。因みに前日（12月1日）時点のレーティングコンセンサスは2.8（アナリスト数10人）で「中立」の水準、目標株価コンセンサスは2,504円（アナリスト数10人）となっている。
main_content_en: On December 2, a major Japanese securities firm maintained its rating on Shiseido < 4911 > at Neutral (3). Meanwhile, the target price was lowered from 2,340 yen to 2,130 yen. Incidentally, as of the previous day (December 1), the consensus rating was 2.8 (based on 10 analysts), which is a "Neutral" level, and the consensus target price was 2,504 yen (based on 10 analysts).

headline: Today's [New All-Time Highs] 68 issues including Nippon Densetsu, Mitsubishi UFJ
description: Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group hit an all-time high today, defying a general market decline. This was attributed to a focus on a December interest rate hike scenario following remarks by the Bank of Japan Governor.
key_takeaways: 68 companies hit new all-time highs, contrasting with a 950-yen drop in the Nikkei 225 Stock Average.;Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group reached an all-time high, influenced by remarks from the Bank of Japan Governor regarding a potential December interest rate hike.;Nippon Densetsu Kogyo, Sanju San Financial Group, and Inaba Denki Sangyo achieved new highs for the sixth consecutive day.;Stocks hitting all-time highs are considered "blue-sky stocks" due to the absence of past resistance levels.;The Nikkei 225 Stock Average fell for the first time in five days, closing at 49,303 yen, driven by profit-taking and concerns about short-term overheating.
breaking_recap_reasoning: The article explicitly reports on events that occurred 'today' and were 'Distributed on 12/1 at 20:10', focusing on stocks that 'Hit All-Time High' and 'updated their all-time highs', clearly indicating a newly happened event.
news_worthy_reasoning: The article is a multi-company consolidation piece, listing 68 stocks that hit all-time highs. While it mentions Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group and attributes its rise to interest rate hike speculation, the information is presented as a report of a past event (the stock already hit an all-time high) rather than providing new, forward-looking actionable intelligence specific to MUFG. The underlying reason (BOJ remarks on interest rates) is a general market theme affecting the financial sector, not a unique development for MUFG that hasn't already been priced in.
news_worthy_key_factors: Multi-company consolidation: MUFG is one of 68 stocks listed, not the primary focus., Reporting of past event: The article states MUFG 'hit an all-time high' rather than providing a catalyst for future movement., General market theme: Interest rate hike speculation is a broad factor for financials, not a specific, unique development for MUFG., Limited depth on MUFG: No specific analysis or forward-looking implications for MUFG beyond its inclusion in a list of high-performing stocks.
original_headline: 本日の【上場来高値更新】 日本電設、三菱ＵＦＪなど68銘柄
main_content: 本日の【上場来高値更新】 日本電設、三菱ＵＦＪなど68銘柄 12/1 20:10 配信 三菱ＵＦＪ　＜月足＞　「株探」多機能チャートより 現在値 ホクリヨウ 3,225 -105 日本電設工 3,210 -25 三十三ＦＧ 4,110 + 20 三菱ＵＦＪ 2,463 + 39.50 因幡電産 2,500 -5.50 本日の日経平均株価は、短期的な過熱への警戒から利益確定売りが優勢となり、前週末比950円安の4万9303円と5日ぶりに反落した。相場全体が下落するなか、逆行高で上場来高値を更新した銘柄は68社だった。上場来高値を更新した銘柄は過去の売買による抵抗帯がなく、いわゆる“株価青天井”銘柄として注目される。 上場来高値を更新した主な銘柄は、日銀総裁発言で12月利上げシナリオが意識された三菱ＵＦＪフィナンシャル・グループ<8306>[東証Ｐ]など。そのほか、日本電設工業<1950>[東証Ｐ]、三十三フィナンシャルグループ<7322>[東証Ｐ]、因幡電機産業<9934>[東証Ｐ]の3社は6日連続で高値を更新した。 ※23年1月時点で株式を新規公開し、東証プライム、スタンダード、グロース市場に上場する銘柄を対象とした。 ■本日、上場来高値を更新した銘柄一覧 コード 銘柄名　　　　市場　業種 <1384>ホクリヨウ　　東Ｓ　水産・農林業 <1417>ミライトワン　東Ｐ　建設業 <1718>美樹工業　　　東Ｓ　建設業 <1719>安藤ハザマ　　東Ｐ　建設業 <1762>高松グループ　東Ｐ　建設業 <1870>矢作建　　　　東Ｐ　建設業 <1879>新日本建　　　東Ｐ　建設業 <1909>日本ドライ　　東Ｓ　機械 <1926>ライト　　　　東Ｐ　建設業 <1944>きんでん　　　東Ｐ　建設業 <1950>日本電設　　　東Ｐ　建設業 <1951>エクシオＧ　　東Ｐ　建設業 <1980>ダイダン　　　東Ｐ　建設業 <2768>双日　　　　　東Ｐ　卸売業 <3288>オープンＨ　　東Ｐ　不動産業 <3659>ネクソン　　　東Ｐ　情報・通信業 <3968>セグエＧ　　　東Ｐ　情報・通信業 <4099>四国化ＨＤ　　東Ｐ　化学 <4220>リケンテクノ　東Ｐ　化学 <4368>扶桑化学　　　東Ｐ　化学 <4401>ＡＤＥＫＡ　　東Ｐ　化学 <4403>日油　　　　　東Ｐ　化学 <4617>中国塗　　　　東Ｐ　化学 <4626>太陽ＨＤ　　　東Ｐ　化学 <4966>上村工　　　　東Ｓ　化学 <5101>浜ゴム　　　　東Ｐ　ゴム製品 <5463>丸一管　　　　東Ｐ　鉄鋼 <5644>メタルアート　東Ｓ　鉄鋼 <5830>いよぎんＨＤ　東Ｐ　銀行業 <5831>しずおかＦＧ　東Ｐ　銀行業 <5832>ちゅうぎんＦ　東Ｐ　銀行業 <5857>ＡＲＥＨＤ　　東Ｐ　非鉄金属 <6016>ジャパンエン　東Ｓ　輸送用機器 <6357>三精テクノロ　東Ｓ　機械 <6432>竹内製作所　　東Ｐ　機械 <6454>マックス　　　東Ｐ　機械 <6455>モリタＨＤ　　東Ｐ　輸送用機器 <6516>山洋電　　　　東Ｐ　電気機器 <6745>ホーチキ　　　東Ｐ　電気機器 <6777>ｓａｎｔｅｃ　東Ｓ　電気機器 <6785>鈴木　　　　　東Ｐ　電気機器 <7167>めぶきＦＧ　　東Ｐ　銀行業 <7173>東京きらぼし　東Ｐ　銀行業 <7181>かんぽ生命　　東Ｐ　保険業 <7182>ゆうちょ銀　　東Ｐ　銀行業 <7184>富山第一銀　　東Ｐ　銀行業 <7202>いすゞ　　　　東Ｐ　輸送用機器 <7322>三十三ＦＧ　　東Ｐ　銀行業 <7327>第四北越ＦＧ　東Ｐ　銀行業 <7389>あいちＦＧ　　東Ｐ　銀行業 <7456>松田産業　　　東Ｐ　卸売業 <7483>ドウシシャ　　東Ｐ　卸売業 <7762>シチズン　　　東Ｐ　精密機器 <8002>丸紅　　　　　東Ｐ　卸売業 <8015>豊田通商　　　東Ｐ　卸売業 <8060>キヤノンＭＪ　東Ｐ　卸売業 <8137>サンワテク　　東Ｐ　卸売業 <8154>加賀電子　　　東Ｐ　卸売業 <8306>三菱ＵＦＪ　　東Ｐ　銀行業 <8331>千葉銀　　　　東Ｐ　銀行業 <8334>群馬銀　　　　東Ｐ　銀行業 <8359>八十二　　　　東Ｐ　銀行業 <8418>山口ＦＧ　　　東Ｐ　銀行業 <9367>大東港運　　　東Ｓ　倉庫運輸関連 <9845>パーカー　　　東Ｓ　化学 <9869>加藤産　　　　東Ｐ　卸売業 <9934>因幡電産　　　東Ｐ　卸売業 <9960>東テク　　　　東Ｐ　卸売業
main_content_en: Today's [Hit All-Time High]: 68 Stocks Including Nippon Densetsu and Mitsubishi UFJ. Distributed on 12/1 at 20:10. Mitsubishi UFJ <Monthly Chart> from 'Kabutan' Multi-functional Chart. Current Price: Hokuryo 3,225 -105, Nippon Densetsu Kogyo 3,210 -25, Sanju San Financial Group 4,110 + 20, Mitsubishi UFJ 2,463 + 39.50, Inaba Denki Sangyo 2,500 -5.50. Today, the Nikkei 225 Stock Average fell for the first time in five days, dropping 950 yen from the previous weekend to 49,303 yen, as profit-taking dominated due to concerns about short-term overheating. While the overall market declined, 68 companies updated their all-time highs against the trend. Stocks that hit all-time highs have no resistance levels from past trading, making them noteworthy as so-called 'blue-sky stocks' (stocks with no upper limit). Key stocks that hit all-time highs include Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group <8306> [TSE P], which saw a December interest rate hike scenario become a focus due to remarks by the Bank of Japan Governor. Additionally, three companies—Nippon Densetsu Kogyo <1950> [TSE P], Sanju San Financial Group <7322> [TSE P], and Inaba Denki Sangyo <9934> [TSE P]—updated their highs for the sixth consecutive day. *Targeted stocks are those newly listed as of January 2023 on the TSE Prime, Standard, and Growth markets. ■List of Stocks That Hit All-Time Highs Today Code Company Name Market Industry <1384> Hokuryo TSE S Fisheries, Agriculture & Forestry <1417> Mirait One TSE P Construction <1718> Miki Kogyo TSE S Construction <1719> Ando Hazama TSE P Construction <1762> Takamatsu Group TSE P Construction <1870> Yahagi Construction TSE P Construction <1879> Shinnihon Construction TSE P Construction <1909> Nippon Dry-Chemical TSE S Machinery <1926> Raitec TSE P Construction <1944> Kindai TSE P Construction <1950> Nippon Densetsu Kogyo TSE P Construction <1951> Exeo Group TSE P Construction <1980> Daidan TSE P Construction <2768> Sojitz TSE P Wholesale Trade <3288> Open House Group TSE P Real Estate <3659> Nexon TSE P Information & Communication <3968> Segue Group TSE P Information & Communication <4099> Shikoku Chemicals Corp.
